title: The Republican Party’s Exhausting Obsession
sub_head: To rescue the country, Trump supporters need to refocus.
body:
Every day as I read and marvel about the political shenanigans in Wisconsin (“Wisconsin GOP Suicide Watch,” Review & Outlook, Feb. 22), a beloved former domicile of mine, I surprise myself by being grateful that my current home state of North Carolina, against my own choice, gave its 15 electoral votes to former President Donald Trump. Had it not, I could well be enduring the same exhausting madness my Wisconsin friends are.
Julia Welch
